cast.overview: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.
cast.title: West Side Story

details.biography: Paloma Garcia-Lee is an American actress, dancer and singer making her feature film debut as Graziella in Steven Spielberg's West Side Story. Known for her stand-out performances on stage and screen, Paloma comes from an extensive theatrical background that began when she made her Broadway principal debut at just 17 years old. Paloma has been featured in 6 Broadway shows and numerous theatrical productions nationwide. She is a high school graduate of the University of North Carolina School of the Arts School of Drama. Paloma made her transition to television appearing as Adrienne in the critically acclaimed series Fosse/Verdon on FX.
details.name: Paloma Garcia-Lee
